alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 5:20AM MST until January 08 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Casper Mountain. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will begin Sunday afternoon. The heaviest period of snow is expected after sunset through early Monday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
